Issue.creator: vramaiitkgp
Issue.summary: Decouple Chaincode-Specific Logic from PTE Execution Engine
Issue.description: Currently, chaincode argument generation logic (based on {{ccType}}) is hardcoded in the PTE execution engine ({{pte-execRequest.js}}). We need to decouple this logic so that the execution engine is application-agnostic. We can move the argument-generation logic to separate files corresponding to the application ID.
